messages.title: Fighting for their future
messages.content: Nick Clegg wants to build a better future for our children.

messages.title: We need REAL change
messages.content: After 13 years, the economy is in the wrong direction. We need a REAL alternative: the NHS is a priority, clean up our politics.

messages.title: Fair pay for heroes
messages.content: Massive response to Lib Dem campaign for a fair deal for our troops.

messages.title: Who will put more money in YOUR pocket?
messages.content: The Lib Dems announced a new plan to cut the bills of millions of people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tax cuts for the low and middle income earners
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dem £700 tax cut promise for low and middle income earners.
Improving the pay for troops, particularly lower ranks, ensuring fair treatment and compensation.

mentions.candidate: Nick Clegg wants to build a better future for our children.

issues.economy: The economy is moving in the wrong direction under Labour.
issues.education: Nick Clegg wants to build a better future for our children, implying a focus on improving education.

issues.health: The NHS is a priority for Lib Dem.

housing.content: New mansion tax on homes over £2 million.

quotes.text: Gordon Brown has let people down...

Lib Dem policy highlights like the £700 tax cut.
